LanguageData.ARA_BindDrone.description: Marks an Arachnae Overseer with pheromones. The marked overseer and its subordinate auxiliaries will pledge undying loyalty to the Queen and establish a psychic link with her.\n\nIn addition to manual linking, the Queen will also attempt to automatically link all unlinked Arachnae Overseers every 60 seconds. This type of link is different from manual linking and does not require line of sight.
LanguageData.ARA_BindDrone.label: Pheromone Mark
LanguageData.ARA_RaceBaseSwarmProduceOn.label: Cancel Reproduction Suppression
LanguageData.ARA_RaceBaseSwarmProduceOn.description: Restarts this Arachnae Overseer's ability to automatically breed auxiliaries.
LanguageData.ARA_RaceBaseSwarmProduceOff.label: Reproduction Suppression
LanguageData.ARA_RaceBaseSwarmProduceOff.description: Disables this Arachnae Overseer's ability to automatically breed auxiliaries.
LanguageData.ARA_TrapSpew.label: Burst Cocoon Projection
LanguageData.ARA_TrapSpew.description: Launches a salvo of dormant Arachnae Cocoons, which contain Arachnae Bursters. Once awakened, these dangerous insectoids will immediately seek revenge and rush to end their own lives.
LanguageData.ARA_Proj_Trap.label: Arachnae Burst Cocoon
LanguageData.ARA_TumorSpew.label: Tumor Ejection
LanguageData.ARA_TumorSpew.description: Ejects a tumor that converts a large nearby area into insect creep terrain, facilitating swarm activity and impeding enemy movement.
LanguageData.ARA_TumorSpew.comps.li.failMessage: Not enough nutrition, needs to feed
LanguageData.ARA_Proj_Tumor.label: Arachnae Tumor
LanguageData.ARA_Tumor_Smokepop.label: Arachnae Withered Tumor
LanguageData.ARA_Tumor_Smokepop.description: A special tumor ejected by a few insectoids. In addition to providing light, it spreads a large area of insect creep on the ground, but it withers quickly.
LanguageData.ARA_AcidSprayBurst_Queen.label: Queen Acid Bombardment
LanguageData.ARA_AcidSprayBurst_Queen.description: An Arachnae Queen sprays a large amount of corrosive acid onto the target location. The spray lasts for several seconds to completely cover an area.
LanguageData.ARA_AcidSprayBurst_Queen.comps.li: Not enough nutrition, needs to feed
Acid sac damaged or missing, unable to spray acid
Requires tech node VXI-6 "Acid Sac" to unlock the ability
LanguageData.ARA_Proj_StrongSludgeSpray.label: Arachnae Insectoid Acid
LanguageData.ARA_AcidSprayBurst.label: Acid Bombardment
LanguageData.ARA_AcidSprayBurst.description: An Arachnae Overseer sprays a large amount of corrosive acid onto the target location. While not as potent as the Queen's acid rain, the insect acid still deals substantial damage.
LanguageData.ARA_AcidSprayBurst.comps.li: Not enough nutrition, needs to feed
Acid sac damaged or missing, unable to spray acid
Requires tech node VXI-6 "Acid Sac" to unlock the ability
LanguageData.ARA_Toxic_Needle_Fire.label: Toxic Needle Volley
LanguageData.ARA_Toxic_Needle_Fire.description: An Arachnae Overseer uses its toxic needle gland to fire a volley of venomous tail needles at the enemy.
LanguageData.ARA_Toxic_Needle_Fire.comps.li: Not enough nutrition, needs to feed
Toxic needle gland damaged or missing, unable to fire needles
Requires tech node PAV-5 "Venomous Sting" to unlock the ability
LanguageData.ARA_BaseRace_Acid_Launcher.label: Acid Maw Ejection
LanguageData.ARA_BaseRace_Acid_Launcher.description: Launches an Arachnae Acid Maw Auxiliary to a designated location. Upon landing, this short-lived auxiliary will immediately attack enemies.
LanguageData.ARA_BaseRace_Acid_Launcher.comps.li: Not enough nutrition, needs to feed
LanguageData.ArachnaeBase_Race_Acidcut_Proj.label: Arachnae Acid Maw
LanguageData.ARA_BaseRace_Skyhive_Launcher.label: Skyhive Ejection Nest
LanguageData.ARA_BaseRace_Skyhive_Launcher.descriptio: Launches three Arachnae Skyhive Auxiliaries onto the target. The Skyhives will latch onto the enemy to bite, and can continue to attack the enemy after falling off.
LanguageData.ARA_BaseRace_Skyhive_Launcher.comps.li: Not enough nutrition, needs to feed
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_jump.label: High-Altitude Maneuver
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_jump.description: Uses powerful wings for an instantaneous burst of thrust to reposition to a new location.
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_jump.comps.li.failMessage: Not enough nutrition, needs to feed
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_jump.comps.li: Cannot move on the designated terrain
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_SwarmCall.label: Swarm Call
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_SwarmCall.description: Emits a unique sonic signal, instructing nearby allied insectoids to focus fire on the nearest enemy unit.
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_SwarmCall.comps.li.failMes: Not enough nutrition, needs to feed
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_SwarmCall.comps.li: Cannot use on the designated terrain
LanguageData.ARA_HealSelf.label: Group Heal
LanguageData.ARA_HealSelf.description: Consumes the caster's biosynth reserves to provide healing for itself and nearby insectoids.
LanguageData.ARA_HealSelf.comps.li.failMessage: Not enough nutrition, needs to feed
LanguageData.ARA_Queen_Build_Nest.label: Hatch Nest
LanguageData.ARA_Queen_Build_Nest.description: Deploys an Arachnae Hive on creep. It automatically produces auxiliaries and raises the hive's tier, but can only hatch auxiliaries near the hive.
LanguageData.ARA_Queen_Build_Nest.comps.li.failMessag: Not enough nutrition, needs to feed
LanguageData.ARA_Queen_Build_Nest.comps.li: Can only be built on insect creep
Requires tech node ESS-5 "Biosynth Extraction" to unlock the ability
